1.question: What is the primary focus of the study discussed in the article?

options.A: The role of the hippocampus in anxiety disorders
options.B: The shift of emotion control from lateral frontal pole to dorsolateral prefrontal cortex in anxious individuals

options.D: The genetic basis of anxiety disorders
options.E: The effectiveness of cognitive-behavioral therapy in treating anxiety

options.C: No difference in projections compared to non-anxious individuals

options.A: Higher excitability led to worse control
options.C: Higher excitability led to better control

options.B: Higher error rates in congruent trials
options.C: Higher error rates in incongruent trials

options.B: FPl is more excitable and receives stronger amygdala input
options.C: FPl has no role in emotional control
options.D: FPl is more active in anxious individuals
options.E: FPl is structurally different in anxious individuals

options.A: Inclusion of only male participants in the non-anxious group
